weather_report:
In the hushed hours before dawn, Subiaco drapes herself in scattered clouds, harboring a quiet, introspective mood. By the time the sun considers peeking over the horizon, the sky will have arranged itself into a collage of broken clouds, opening the possibility for fleeting sunshine—an ephemeral kiss of warmth rather than a torrid embrace. With the curious moon just having bid vigil ending, this time allows for leisurely introspection. The beauty of dawn lies not in its spectacle but its gentle arrival. Expect a day highlighted by the subtle interplay of light and shadow, lending the city an air of contemplative grace. 

The UV index may not be at its zenith this morning, yet the sun’s rays will still seek out the exposed nape, urging a mindful application of sunscreen for the careful wanderer. Dress in layers; adapt with the changing tempo of the skies, where cool breezes whisper promises of warmth only to pivot. This is an ideal time for a meditative walk through the waking city, perhaps wandering through a verdant park where solitude meets solace, or simply sitting with an aromatic cup of pressed coffee as the city breathes to life. The weather offers a canvas for a perfectly imperfect day—relax, listen to the world meander, allowing thoughts to drift like the clouds above.
